pages.text: Zakazat ona bol zviera umrel z themselves blood meat pigs zviera dedicated do inak than GOD (Zviera umrel z themselves zapocitat those) zaskrtit struck object fallen height gored zachvatit wild zviera! -Ona save tvoj zivocisny it umrel -Zviera sacrificed altars. They consult ona zaujem co je lawful them; say Lawful ona bol all dobry things co vlak dogs falcons chytat ona. Ona vlak them GOD's teachings! Ona jestn co they chytat ona zmierit sa GOD's vola sa thereupon Ona observe GOD GOD bol ZDATNY DO reckoning

Dnes all dobry food robit lawful ona. food ludia scripture bol lawful for ona.
